actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to provide that no individual may be seated as a Representative or as a Senator after attaining the age of 68.

summary.text: Provides that no individual may be seated as a Representative or as a Senator after attaining the age of sixty-eight.

titles.title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to provide that no individual may be seated as a Representative or as a Senator after attaining the age of 68.
